item.title: I want to be a bigger Zaar Dork
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Kelly prints her own Badge to go to Taste of Home Cooking Expo Bev wants to print Zaar Business Cards: I had an idea of little Zaar "Business Cards" your could carry in your wallet to pass out to your friends. They could have your Zaar chef's photo, Zaar ID #, Zaar address, etc! Use them as little advertisements to pass around. CafePress here we come!
